entities.name: giant
entities.description: Grawp is described as a giant in the text. The text states that he has an enormous face and hands, indicating his size.

entities.name: centaurs
entities.description: The centaurs are described as waiting for Grawp's outstretched fingers to attack Harry. They scatter out of the way when Grawp yells and stamps his feet.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as being knocked off his legs by a centaur. He pulls Hermione to her feet and runs with her for shelter.

relationships.description: Grawp attacks the centaurs with his outstretched fingers, causing them to scatter. The text states that 'It was what the centaurs had been waiting for' indicating that they were expecting Grawp's attack.
Grawp attacks Harry with his outstretched fingers, knocking him off his legs. The text states that 'It took as the hand flew toward him and knocked a snow-white centaur off his legs.'
The centaurs retreat in disorder when Grawp yells and stamps his feet. The text states that 'they were retreating in disorder, galloping away through the trees on the other side of the clearing.'
Harry pulls Hermione to her feet and runs with her for shelter. The text states that 'He pulled Hermione to her feet' indicating that he is protecting her.
